description.value:
School necromancy; Level cleric/oracle 8, witch 7;

Casting Time 10 minutes
Components V, S, M/DF (dried maggots)

Range close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)
Targets corpse of creature whose total number of HD does not exceed your caster level
Duration instantaneous
Saving Throw none;  Spell Resistance no

Description

This spell functions like @Compendium[pf1.spells.0y3go94j3gfmkduu]{Nature's Ravages}, except the target corpse ages a number of years equal to up to 1 year per caster level (maximum 20 years at 20th level).

target.value: corpse of creature whose total number of HD does not exceed your caster level
